attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let us all celebrate the diversity of our Nation by having a National Holiday every year. We could coincide the date with either St. Georges day in England,or St David's day in Wales and or St. Andrew's day in Scotland. Ireland already has one. Let’s be proud to be British and have a day to celebrate our diversity and cultures

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
